story.title: About Prologue.run
story.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Angus, an avid runner and developer.
story.paragraph2: Like many other runners, I enjoy running marathons outside of my hometown, and I sometimes just wish to see the route before running it (like reading the prologue for a book!). Then I noticed my 360 camera that's been gathering dust, and that's how this idea came to be.
story.paragraph3: Prologue.run allows you to preview the route of a race before you run it, like using Google Maps' Street View feature. Right now, the selection of races is limited to races that I have run, but I plan to add more races in the future as I complete more races. If you have a race that you would like to see on Prologue.run, or if you want to help log a race, please let me know by emailing me at

methodology.title: How it Works
methodology.subtitle: From the first kilometer to the final upload, here is how we bring the race to your screen.

capture.title: Capture
capture.step1: Carry a 360 camera to a race
capture.step2: Set interval photo mode on a 10s timer
capture.step3: Run the entire track from start to finish

processing.title: Processing
processing.step1: Gyro-stabilize to keep the view facing forward
processing.step2: AI-driven face and plate blurring for privacy
processing.step3: Generate equirectangular tiles and sync to DB
processing.step4: Map GPX coordinates to the image sequence
processing.step5: New route is published and ready to scout

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.paragraph1: prologue.run does not require a login, and we do not provide a way for users to upload data. We do not collect personal information such as names, email addresses, or phone numbers unless you contact us directly.
section1.paragraph2: We use standard web analytics to understand how our site is used. This data is anonymous and helps us improve the user experience.

section2.title: 2. Imagery and Privacy
section2.paragraph1: Our 360° imagery is captured in public spaces. We respect individual privacy and strive to ensure that faces and license plates are obscured.

section3.title: 3. Content Removal Requests
section3.paragraph1: If you appear in a photo or 360° view on prologue.run and wish to be removed, please contact us at
section3.requirements: To process your request, you must:
section3.requirement1: Include the exact link to the view where you are visible.
section3.requirement2: Submit proof that you are the person in the imagery.
section3.note: Note: We will only blur your face and other identifying features. Publicly available information, such as store signage or race bib numbers, will not be removed.

section4.title: 4. Cookies
section4.paragraph1: We may use cookies to remember your preferences and improve your experience. You can choose to disable cookies in your browser settings.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Links
section5.paragraph1: Our site may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites.

section6.title: 6. Contact Us
section6.paragraph1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.paragraph1: By accessing and using prologue.run, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

section2.title: 2. Description of Service
section2.paragraph1: prologue.run provides interactive 360° street-level imagery of race routes for preview purposes. The service is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not require user accounts, and there is no facility for users to upload content.

section3.title: 3. Use of Content
section3.paragraph1: All imagery and data provided on prologue.run are for personal, non-commercial use only. You may not scrape, download, or redistribute the content without explicit permission.

section4.title: 4. Privacy and Data
section4.paragraph1: Our collection and use of data are governed by our Privacy Policy. Since we do not offer accounts or uploads, we do not store personal user data beyond standard web analytics.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.paragraph1: prologue.run is not responsible for any inaccuracies in the imagery or route data. Users should rely on official race information for accurate course details. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of this service.
